Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Requires dental insurance coverage to be offered to employees that is effective immediately upon the starting date of employment
Summary: Requires dental insurance coverage to be offered to employees that is effective immediately upon the starting date of employment.
LawCode: Amd ยง160, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to requiring dental insurance coverage to be offered to employees that is effective immediately upon the starting date of employment
